page.description: The Restore Window action restores the a window to its previous size. Choose to restore the current window, or another Form or Browse window.

step.description: The Restore which window? selection will be set to "Another Form or Browse Window" if your script is not attached to a window. If it is attached to a window, your option will be "Current Window".
Select either of these two radio buttons to populate the Window name list:
Select the form or browse from the Window name list.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.
